# How To Charge Cards On File

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/how-to-charge-cards-on-file/

## Category
18 Payments

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYMENTS
CREDIT CARDS
Taking Credit Card Payments

You can check out a sale using a card on file or by manually entering the client's credit card information.

Link copied
Charging a card on file

To charge a card on file, go to the Payments screen and select Credit Card. The Credit Card payment button is only available if you have signed up for payment processing.

If the client has multiple cards on file, select the card to use and select Charge.

Link copied
Manually entering a credit card

To manually enter a client's credit card information, go to the Payments screen and select Credit Card. The Credit Card payment button is only available if you have signed up for payment processing.

Enter the client's credit card information and select Add.

Select Charge to complete the sale.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
